meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Margaret Minett-Longdon Brendan O'Connor Erik Dresner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6449.

td.p: Margaret Minett-Longdon, a healthcare worker from Winnebago, Illinois
Brendan O'Connor, an Internet security engineer from San Francisco, California
Erik Dresner, an Internet marketer from Elmhurst, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,401)

tr.td: THE STOCK MARKET
BULLS & BEARS
A VOWEL OF SILENCE
WE GOVERNED THAT STATE
ROCKTOBER
(Kelly: A fascinating journey along Southeast Asia's mightiest river.)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Margaret: What is euro?)

the pound sterling

BrendanMargaret
')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Kelly of the Clue Crew reads with two cart-yoked ungulates from Vietnam.)
